Overall, the paper is well-written and presents a novel approach to characterizing the sectional category of a map in terms of its Koszul-Quillen model. The methodology is sound and the paper is supported by credible references from the field. While the understandability could be improved in some sections, the relevance of the work and the quality of citations are generally good. The linguistic style is strong and the grammar is sound, contributing to the overall high score of 8.
